name: Pixelated RPG
description:
This is a Pixelated 2D Platformer game.  In this game you have to dodge obstacles get to a portal Also collect coins on each of the levels to win the game. 

(Note: You need Godots Latest Game Engine to play this Game, Also I don't  recommend playing this game as this is just a prototype, not Final game)

Please download. I took all the screenshots from jean makes games YT channel support his channel he's an amazing creator

Jean Makes Games YT channel Link:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9HtDwwKOq2S2mJZCmPB1rw

Also support my YT channel Link:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh63CAFA8mzKY6521I5kAcw
